text: István Szabácsy (1 September 1926 - 30 November 1988) was a Hungarian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Hungarian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Hungary Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Tolna County
title: István Szabácsy
